messages.subject: Join me for a blogtalk radio show about unschooling.
messages.msgSnippet: Passion Parent, Christine Hiebel s has a show called Just Parenting About and I am going to be there talking about unschooling. I would love for you to be
messages.messageBody:
Passion Parent, Christine Hiebel's has a show called "Just Parenting
About" and I am going to be there talking about unschooling.

I would love for you to be there today to support and share your
thoughts, ideas and experiences about unschooling as her audience has
a broad base of parents with different philosophies.

It's today at 4:30 PST /7:30 EST

You can find her show at: blogtalkradio.com/just-about-parenting
Or you can call in at (646) 595-2418

Thank you so much for supporting and singing the praises of unschooling!

smiles and joy,
Rain
